title: Leadership Practical Competency Strengthening: Math Proficiency Course via Question-Embedded Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately answer over 80% of three or more embedded key questions in pre-class videos
Learners can reconstruct core concepts within 15 minutes using a question checklist provided at the start of class
Learners complete simulation tasks with over 90% accuracy and achieve at least 70% problem-solving precision in a flipped learning environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
